resources.string:
v2.2.10-06
 Fixed crash running under Android 12.
 
 Location Fixes:
 Suffolk County, NY
 
 v2.2.10-05
 Updated to be fully compatible with Android 12.
 
 Disabling battery optimization is now mandatory under Android 12. Actually battery consumption should be unaffected.
